me.lucko.helper.scoreboard

Interface ScoreboardTeam

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PacketScoreboardTeam

    @NonnullByDefault
public interface ScoreboardTeam
    Represents a specific team on a Scoreboard.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ScoreboardTeam.CollisionRule 
      static class  ScoreboardTeam.NameTagVisibility

      • unsubscribe

        void unsubscribe(Player player,
                 boolean fast)
        Unsubscribes a player from this team
        Parameters:
        player - the player to unsubscribe
        fast - if true, the removal packet will not be sent (for use when the player is leaving)

      • unsubscribeAll

        void unsubscribeAll()
        Unsubscribes all players from this team
